name: Meccha! Taiko no Tatsujin DS: 7-tsu no Shima no Daibouken
name_original: Meccha! Taiko no Tatsujin DS: 7-tsu no Shima no Daibouken
description:
Meccha! Taiko no Tatsujin DS: 7-tsu no Shima no Daibouken is an action game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It was originally released in 2008. Bandai Namco Entertainment published the game.
Meccha! Taiko no Tatsujin DS: 7-tsu no Shima no Daibouken is available on Nintendo DS.
